TextView.android:text: With the new Design support library for Android, it has become easier for us to create some great animations with minimal effort , CollapsingToolbarLayout is the newly introduced in Lollipop , using which you can create awesome scrolling effects .According to the android documentation CollapsingToolbarLayout is a wrapper for Toolbar which implements a collapsing app bar. It is designed to be used as a direct child of a AppBarLayout
